entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to periods of drizzle near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
